name: Heart of Space
description:
Move with: WASD  

Shoot with: Space  

Use the shield with: LShift

Pause with: Escape

Each boss defeated before the boss guarantees an improved or additional skill

The game automatically saves after each boss and can be loaded on death

Heal life every 25 points  

The faster you defeat and reach the bosses the more points you will earn

The 8-bit font are a free fons from dafont.com.
